latest_articles.title: Philippe Morillon, General Who Made Fateful Protection Promise, Dies at 90
latest_articles.summary: “I will never abandon you,” he told residents of Srebrenica amid sectarian armed conflict in Bosnia. The town later suffered the worst massacre in Europe since World War II.
latest_articles.evidence: town later suffered the worst massacre in Europe since World War II

latest_articles.title: Truckers’ Balkan border blockade over EU rules continues
latest_articles.summary: Dozens of goods checkpoints in Bosnia, Montenegro and North Macedonia have been blocked as part of a coordinated effort by trucking unions
latest_articles.evidence: Truckers’ Balkan border blockade over EU rules continues
